definition: Beijing-Shanghai High-Speed Railway, completed in 2010/abbr. for 京滬高速鐵路|京沪高速铁路

pinyin: gao1 tie3 xue4 hong2 dan4 bai2

sentences.english: Alleviating air traffic congestion is one of the major goals of the new push into high-speed rail.
sentences.chinese: 推动高铁发展的主要目的，就是缓解空中交通的拥挤。

sentences.english: Biden said it would be good for the economy.
sentences.chinese: 拜登称高铁网络将有利于经济发展。

sentences.english: While there, he plans totake a high-speed train ride from Beijing to Tianjin, said government spokesman Yongyuth Mayalarp said.
sentences.chinese: 他计划坐高铁从北京到天津，泰国政府发言人说。

sentences.english: However, in HSR territory, the issue is even more important.
sentences.chinese: 然而，在高铁领域，这项事务更是重中之重。

sentences.english: Passengers traveling on the line pay 555 yuan for a one-way, economy-class ticket between Beijing and Shanghai.
sentences.chinese: 京沪高铁单程二等座的票价为555元。

sentences.english: In Fujian and Zhejiang, another coastal province, train services were suspended, flights canceled and fishing boats called back to ports.
sentences.chinese: 闽浙两省的高铁暂停运营，航班被取消，渔船归港。

sentences.english: Experts estimate that the high-speed railway will take 30 percent of passengers from airlines.
sentences.chinese: 专家预计，高铁将会夺走航空市场30%的客源。

sentences.english: The new line, he noted, was 'still in a break-in period.'
sentences.chinese: 王勇平指出，京沪高铁仍在磨合期。

sentences.english: In that range high-speed could compete quite favorably with air travel.
sentences.chinese: 高铁在此范围内欢迎与空中旅行竞争。

sentences.english: I think you should chose China for this project.
sentences.chinese: 我认为你们应该选择让中国修高铁。

sentences.english: The first in Indonesia is the highspeed rail from Jakarta to Bandung.
sentences.chinese: 而在印尼的第一个项目是建造雅加达到万隆的高铁。

sentences.english: China is building not only high speed trains but planes.
sentences.chinese: 中国不仅在建设高铁，还在修建飞机。

sentences.english: Dedicated tracks are important to the development of high-speed railways.
sentences.chinese: 专用线对发展高铁很重要。

sentences.english: Over-exposure to NF3via inhalation induces the conversion of hemoglobin to methemoglobin .
sentences.chinese: 过量吸入NF3会导致血色素转化成高铁血红蛋白。

sentences.english: Yet high-speed rail faces tougher challenges in the U.S. than it does in Japan or Europe.
sentences.chinese: 但高铁在美国遇到的困难比在日本或者欧洲更大。

sentences.english: The CRH can zoom at speeds of 394 km per hour.
sentences.chinese: 中国的高铁时速迅速串升到每小时394公里的水平。

definition: power car/multiple-unit train (abbr. for 動車組|动车组)
Beijing-Shanghai High-Speed Railway, completed in 2010/abbr. for 京滬高速鐵路|京沪高速铁路
light rail/transit system (underground, at street level or elevated)/streetcar/metro/abbr. for 輕型軌道交通|轻型轨道交通[qing1 xing2 gui3 dao4 jiao1 tong1]
green train (slow, noisy, unairconditioned train with forest green livery and yellow trim that ran on the Chinese railway system from the 1950s, phased out in the early 21st century)
to open to traffic (e.g. new bridge, rail line etc)/(of a locality) to have a transportation service/(Tw) to commute
